timeline.bodyText: Why are you not using sdk-java v2? @tristantarrant
timeline.author: slinkydeveloper

replies.bodyText:
We try not to use non-final releases, and at the time 2.0.0 was only at milestone 3.
Now that RC1 is out, I'll upgrade.
replies.author: danberindei

replies.bodyText:
@slinkydeveloper I actually removed this property, because I'm not relying on the SDK to build the event.
I build the event without the SDK because we are trying to remove the dependency on jackson-databind, which is a huge source of CVEs for us.
replies.author: danberindei

replies.bodyText: I see, we hope to remove in the sdk too the jackson-databind dependency soon, although this as usual takes time :)
replies.author: slinkydeveloper
